EmailTemplate.name: Barcelona Spring I/O 2016 Q116.Invite 3-9-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal at the Spring I/O Conference - May 19-20 Barcelona, Spain
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
The largest Spring event in Europe is back! Want to know about the state-of-the-art of the Spring ecosystem? Spring Boot, Spring Reactive, Spring Data, Spring Cloud, Cloud Native Applications…? Come to Spring I/O at the amazing Axa Auditorium in Barcelona, Spain May 19-20, 2016 and engage with Spring team leads from Pivotal, and members of the Spring community from all over continental Europe.
Just some of the Pivotal speakers from the Spring Team
Juergen Hoeller <[[https://twitter.com/springjuergen]]> - Spring Framework Lead Brian Clozel <[[https://twitter.com/brianclozel]]> - Spring Framework committer Sebastian Deleuze <[[https://twitter.com/sdeleuze]]> - Spring Framework committer Rossen Stoyanchev <[[https://twitter.com/rstoya05]]> - Spring Framework committer Stephane Maldini <[[https://twitter.com/smaldini]]> - Spring Reactive lead Josh Long <[[https://twitter.com/starbuxman]]> - Spring Developer Advocate
Get your ticket now <[[http://springio.net/]]> before price increases on May 2, 2016
Not too much time left to enjoy the developer-friendly price of 259€. Secure your ticket before 2nd of May to enjoy 2 days with 4 tracks packed with amazing talks and a selection of practical workshops.
Sponsors
Sponsors are one of the things that make Spring I/O a great event. If your company is interested, please get in touch to for further information. Your support will make it possible for our community to gather, learn and build the future of the Spring ecosystem.
Questions
If you have any questions for the organizing team, reach out to us on twitter: @spring_io or by email at events@javahispano.org <[[mailto: events@javahispano.org]]>
